input.newString:
value: (process.env.NODE_ENV === 'development' || process.env.NODE_ENV === undefined)
              ? 'no-cache, no-store, must-revalidate'

metadata.diff:
Index: /home/user/project/next.config.js
===================================================================
--- /home/user/project/next.config.js
+++ /home/user/project/next.config.js
@@ -12,9 +12,9 @@
 source: '/(.*)',
 headers: [
   {
     key: 'Cache-Control',
-    value: process.env.NODE_ENV === 'development' 
+    value: (process.env.NODE_ENV === 'development' || process.env.NODE_ENV === undefined)
       ? 'no-cache, no-store, must-revalidate'
       : 'public, max-age=3600',
   },
 ],
